Illegal drugs
Illegal drugs like cannabis, 
ecstasy, cocaine and heroin 
can harm your baby. If you 
use any illegal drugs, it is 
important to talk to your 
doctor or midwife so that 
they can provide you with 
advice and support to help 
you stop. They can also refer 
you for additional support.

initially need drug treatment to
